title: Site Metadata
description: Format for md2blog site metadata file (site.json).

title.description: Title for the site (displayed at the top of every page).

description.description: Optional (but recommended) description of the site (used in meta tags and also used as the default subtitle on all pages).

url.description: Optional (but recommended) URL for the root of the site (used in Atom feed and Open Graph links).

colors.description: Optional object specifying colors to use on the site. Note that all colors are reused for syntax highlighting.

title.description: Color used for the site title.

comment.description: Color used only for syntax highlighting (generally for comments).
